trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Hico
There were no other sightings in Hico on or around March 8th 2011
divs: sighting detailsmy buddy just called me to tell me he saw a ufo in hico tx the size of two football fields, with lights that cycled on and off from left to right. he said they were unloading something from the back of his pickup truck and they looked towards the west and seen this object coming straight at them. they kept looking at the object for about 30 seconds then the lights went out and then shorlty after two helicopters were flying around like looking for someone\something.
